Body: Description: Website "https://indiankanoon.org/" is not opening although we whitelisted this website in allowlist with mentioned below *.indiankanoon.org* *.indiankanoon.com* Attached the showing DLP error

• CAP report log - how does it look like? What is the blocked thread?
  • Intercept VPN is on?
  • Certificate validation is enabled for all 3 marks?

What We've Learned Updated: Adding mentioned below website details in allowed URL list in “URL Categories” under Denylists and Allowlists resolved the issue.

*.indiankanoon.org*
*.indiankanoon.com*
Next Steps Updated: Proposed remote session.
